text: The Wagyu Beef was exquisite - perfectly marbled and cooked to perfection. While expensive, the quality justified the price for this special occasion.
An unforgettable dining experience! The Lobster Thermidor was divine, and the sommelier's wine pairing was impeccable. Worth every penny.
The food was excellent but the portions were quite small for the price. The truffle risotto was flavorful but I left still hungry.
Impeccable service and presentation. The foie gras was sublime, though the ambiance felt slightly pretentious for my taste.
Expected more for these prices. The duck was overcooked and the service was slow despite the restaurant being half-empty.
